Text: Adjusted Final Gross Bonus Spending by CompanyTracey An adjusted final gross bonus spending by company for bonuses paid is attached Please use this updated information The change effects company Judy Lin has the updated numbers Ann Forwarded by Ann VaughnHRCorpEnron on PM Ann Vaughn PM To Tracy GeacconeGPGFINEnron cc Michele NRON Subject Final Gross Bonus Spending by Company Tracy The final gross bonus spending by company for bonuses paid is attached I have sent each of the accounting groups their specific information John Keiser Gary Zahn Donna Burns Judy Lin Please call either me or Michele Denby if you have questions or need additional information Ann

Personal Achievement Award PAA Program Cc Personal Best Award PBA program has been renamed Personal Achievement Award PAA program The following guidelines were reviewed with Stan Eligibility managers and above are not eligible to receive PAA awards All awards require Division Head approval The maximum award is Awards over maximum require Chairman approval Award amounts should be based on organizational impact Unspent PAA dollars can not be added to the bonus pool Your PAA pool and yeartodate spending are as follows Pool Allocation YTD Spending Balance A detail report of the awards processed year to date will be sent via interoffice mail today Please carefully review all awards before submitting for payment and processing There are limited reserve pool dollars this year Call me if you have any questions Ann

Due Diligence Information Cc Michelle Heres the list of information I need for Northern Natural Gas EEOC charges lawsuits andor judgments entered or settlement agreements reached in the last years including discrimination harassment workers comp and ERISA claims or otherwise including any compliance agreements consent decrees etc with any governmental agency ie OFCCP EEOC DOL etc List of any pending government compliance audits administrative proceedings employee grievances regarding compliance with wage overtime or safety and health issues I talked with Valeria and she is pulling the EEOC charge information Of course I need this as soon as possible Thanks for your help Ann
